title: landingData
description:
The landing data sent to FALS. 
In case the requested mode is XYZ - send x,y,z distances from landing point. In case Mavlink mode - send mavlink commands for flying the drone.

oneOf.description: In case the requested mode was xyz

landingAzimuth.description: In case the azimuthType is "Defined" the value need to be the Azimuth related to true north

x.description: The x distace from the target in meters

y.description: The y distace from the target in meters

z.description:
The altitude in meters above ground
If no accurate altitude - omit field

FovRelativeX.description:
The location relative to the X direction FOV max.
1.00 - max of fwd from drone X direction
-1.00 - max of bwd from drone X direction

FovRelativeY.description:
The location relative to the Y direction FOV max.
1.00 - max of right from drone in the Y direction
-1.00 - max of left from drone in the Y direction
